LanguageData.DMSAC_HackFailedDesc: Due to {0}'s mistakes, mech was not getting controlled as expected.
LanguageData.DMSAC_CorpNeutralDesc:
"Code 5, registered personal identified."
"This is {0}, IFF codes synchronized, cease fire."

This ancient automatroid command system recognized {1}'s identity. Out of respect for {1}, it has temporarily halted hostilities to your colonists.
LanguageData.DMSAC_CorpAllyDesc:
"Code 5, registered personal identified."
"This is {0}, if you require any resources, please formally submit a military surplus requisition form to the {0} logistics office."

Out of trust in {1}, the ancient automatroid command system turned a blind eye to the colonists' actions but issued a warning as per protocol.
LanguageData.DMSAC_CorpAllyDownDesc:
"Code 5, registered personal identified."
"This is {0}, paying tribute to the Slayer of Zalta and thanking you for your contributions to the colonization project."

This ancient automatroid command system recognized {1}'s identity. Out of respect for {1}, it has authorized the colonists to operate freely in this area.
LanguageData.DMSAC_CorpHostileDesc: An automatroid patrol has discovered colonists intruding into a military facility. After a brief preparation period, they will attempt to expel your colonists.\n\nBased on intercepted communication frequency fluctuations, nearby automatroid patrols in this area may be on their way to reinforcement.
